question: Which stock exchange has collaborated with IIT Alumni Council for listing of start-ups?
explanation:
The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) has recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with IIT Alumni Council to encourage listing of start-ups.
IIT Alumni Council is the largest body of alumni, students and faculty across all the 23 IITs. The partnership aims at developing confidence among investors in the start-upâ€™s platform. This will also ensure a complete ecosystem for the proposed social stock exchange.
